title: Remove endorsement initialization from ProjectType constructions
description: Edit `src/backend/app/graphql/types/project.py` to remove all instances of `_endorsements=[]` when constructing `UserType` objects. This ensures ProjectType can still create UserType instances without endorsement data.
acceptance_criteria:
- No `_endorsements=[]` parameter in any UserType constructions in project.py
- ProjectType compiles successfully
- Project queries return valid data with user objects
